body_html:
There is a related thread tensorflow/serving#228 (comment) where I provided a solution.
I think I figured it out, I'm not sure how orthodox my solution is, but at least it works for me.

A lot of people try to use canned estimators right now (especially wide and deep one), but because there is no documentation majority is confused.

I'd be willing to contribute if help is welcome.

body:
There is a related thread https://github.com/tensorflow/serving/issues/228#issuecomment-300146926 where I provided a solution.
I think I figured it out, I'm not sure how orthodox my solution is, but at least it works for me.

A lot of people try to use canned estimators right now (especially wide and deep one), but because there is no documentation majority is confused.

I'd be willing to contribute if help is welcome.
